sections.name: Seldeg Bheldis
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

traits.name: Medium
traits.text: *Space:* 5 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 5 feet, *Reach (Long):* 5 feet

traits.name: Undead
traits.text: Once living, these creatures were infused after death with negative energy and soul-corrupting evil magic. When reduced to 0 Hit Points, an undead creature is destroyed. Undead creatures are damaged by positive energy, are healed by negative energy, and don't benefit from healing effects.

automatic_abilities.name: Sacrilegious Aura

traits.name: Abjuration
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Evil
traits.text: Evil effects often manipulate energy from evil-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to good divine servants or divine servants of good deities. A creature with this trait is evil in alignment.

automatic_abilities.text: When a creature in the aura uses a positive spell or ability, the graveknight automatically attempts to counteract it with a +27 counteract modifier.

automatic_abilities.name: Iron Command
automatic_abilities.trigger: An enemy within 15 feet damages Seldeg
automatic_abilities.effect: Seldeg puts an impertinent foe who dared harm him in their proper place. He commands the enemy to kneel in obedience. If they refuse, they must pay the price in pain and anguish. The triggering creature must choose one of the following options: the enemy kneels, dropping prone as a free action, or the enemy refuses and takes 5d6 mental damage. In addition, Seldeg's Strikes against the triggering creature deal an additional 3 damage until the end of his next turn. Seldeg chooses whether the additional damage is evil or negative each time he uses this reaction.

traits.name: Fire
traits.text: Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait are composed of flames that continually burn with no fuel source. Fire planes are extremely hostile to non-fire creatures.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Versatile
traits.text: A versatile weapon can be used to deal a different type of damage than that listed in the Damage entry. This trait indicates the alternate damage type. For instance, a piercing weapon that is versatile S can be used to deal piercing or slashing damage. You choose the damage type each time you make an attack.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Finesse
traits.text: You can use your Dexterity modifier instead of your Strength modifier on attack rolls using this melee weapon. You still use your Strength modifier when calculating damage.

traits.name: Fire
traits.text: Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait are composed of flames that continually burn with no fuel source. Fire planes are extremely hostile to non-fire creatures.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.text: Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait are composed of flames that continually burn with no fuel source. Fire planes are extremely hostile to non-fire creatures.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Thrown
traits.text: You can throw this weapon as a ranged attack, and it is a ranged weapon when thrown. A thrown weapon adds your Strength modifier to damage just like a melee weapon does. When this trait appears on a melee weapon, it also includes the range increment. Ranged weapons with this trait use the range increment specified in the weapon’s Range entry.

ability.name: Devastating Blast

traits.name: Arcane
traits.text: This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

traits.name: Fire
traits.text: Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait are composed of flames that continually burn with no fuel source. Fire planes are extremely hostile to non-fire creatures.

ability.text: Seldeg unleashes a 30-foot cone of fire. Creatures in the area take 9d12 fire damage (DC 35 basic Reflex save). Seldeg can use this ability once every 1d4 rounds.

affliction.name: Graveknight's Curse
affliction.text: This curse affects anyone who wears Seldeg's armor for at least 1 hour.

stages.name: Stage 1
stages.text: doomed 1 and can't remove the armor (1 day)

stages.name: Stage 2
stages.text: doomed 2, hampered 10, and can't remove the armor (1 day)

ability.name: Phantom Steed

traits.name: Arcane
traits.text: This magic comes from the arcane tradition, which is built on logic and rationality. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Conjuration
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the conjuration school of magic, typically involving summoning, creation, teleportation, or moving things from place to place.

ability.text:
Seldeg summons a supernatural mount as per phantom steed (8th level). Unlike phantom steed, the steed's AC and saving throw bonuses are all 4 levels lower than Seldeg's, and the steed has one-third of Seldeg's Hit Points (rounded down). If the steed is destroyed, Seldeg must wait 1 hour before using this ability again.
HP 130; AC 39; Fort +28, Ref +25, Will +22

ability.name: Ruinous Weapons
ability.text: Any weapon or unarmed attack Seldeg uses gains the effects of the +1 greater striking and greater flaming runes.

ability.name: Unyielding Block
ability.text: At the start of each of Seldeg's turns, he gains two additional reactions he can use only to perform a Shield Block.

ability.name: Weapon Master
ability.text: Seldeg has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapon he wields.
